messages.message:
Sr. Software Engineer - Intuit

Brian, 

We are currently working on an 18+ month contract position with Intuit in San Diego that I think fits well with your background. Please see the notes below and let me know if you're interested and I will follow right up.

Thanks!

Responsibilities: 
"	Preference is REST (we don't use SOAP) but a senior candidate that had used SOAP mostly would not be turned away as they should understand both. Minimal exposure to REST is required though. 
"	Consumer for other back end services and develop rest services for our clients to consume from us.
"	This is new development - but with all development there is maintenance involved so it is a part of the day to day.

Jennifer Breadon
jbreadon@cydio.com
619-573-4835
Hey Brian, let me know a good time we can connect to discuss. Thanks!
